## StyleTarget interface

A node that can be targeted by styles.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface StyleTarget extends Pick<Node, "getRootNode"> 
```
**Extends:** Pick&lt;Node, "getRootNode"&gt;

Method


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[append(styles)](../fast-element.styletarget.append/)


</td><td>
